website_summaries.verdict: The Canon PowerShot Elph 190 IS doesn't offer as much as more expensive cameras, but it's the best choice if you're looking for an inexpensive point-and-shoot.

customer_reviews.title: A good camera for quick photos.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use camera always switches on in auto mode so it's ready for a quick snap. It has the other modes of operation when needed.
customer_reviews.author: micky_f

customer_reviews.title: Very clear
customer_reviews.text: Have only used a few times but the pictures are great they are so clear and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Lynda Patten

customer_reviews.title: Great looking camera
customer_reviews.text: Great looking camera,but a bit too complicated for me. Would have been better if it had simple instructions instead of 140 odd pages to download.
customer_reviews.author: Carole P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The anti shake thingy is excellent. A nice compact and easy to use camera.
customer_reviews.author: tombers

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera easy to use and nice picture quality
customer_reviews.author: sharon fisher

customer_reviews.title: Quite easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I use the camera for basic snapshots. The online manual explains different options for settings. Photos taken so far have turned out well.
customer_reviews.author: Travel snapper

customer_reviews.title: Great  Camera
customer_reviews.text: Great wee point & shoot with top notch quality shots!
customer_reviews.author: fm

customer_reviews.title: Canon IXUS190 camera
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my camera, easy to use and understand
customer_reviews.author: Paula Long

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality is as expected - pretty good, but not a DSLR
customer_reviews.text: Small point and click compact camera. Picture quality is as expected - pretty good, but not a DSLR!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen A.

customer_reviews.title: Can't revue it as I hav't used it yet but ...
customer_reviews.text: Can't revue it as I hav't used it yet but have gave it 4 stars as it just what I wanted size wise and being a cannon I'm sure it will be good
customer_reviews.author: dave m

customer_reviews.title: Time & Date Every Time I Turn on
customer_reviews.text: Set the time and date take the battery out to charge, it loses its time and date put battery back in, enter time and date. its very very annoying because its used in the office and after every use its put on charge, it loses its time and date. then when its away to be used i have to set the time and date before handing it off to the person. i thought it would have a RTC battery.
customer_reviews.author: matt
